name: Disc Pull
description:
Play on Firefox for better performance

DISC PULL

Design, code, art by Yongmin Park

SFX by doseone

Soundtrack by MusicByPedro

Controls
  • Keyboard
    • Movement: arrows
    • Pulling Disc: X
    • Jump: spacebar or Z
  • Gamepad (Xbox)
    • Movement: left stick
    • Pulling Disc: X
    • Jump: A
